alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:06PM MDT until May 25 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL DAWSON COUNTY... At 805 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Glendive, or near Glendive, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Glendive, West Glendive, Stipek and Forest Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
